ratings.comment: Nixon was fantastic as a creative writing workshop instructor. There were three workshopped essay assignments--two mid-length and one 750 word one--spread throughout the semester, but your final portfolio requires revisions on only two of those.  Grading--participate and turn in two revised drafts at the end and you should earn an A, no problem.
Great class, great TA, great introduction to lit at Madison.  Sexy accent.  He's straight (but married..)

Loved this class.  The books were all very enjoyable to read.  Grade depends on TA, but most TAs realize that Lit classes are mandatory, not just for English majors...so most are pretty easy with grades.   Six books, two papers, one midterm, and a final.  Definitely recommend this class.
Excellent book selections, was so sad when the course was finished.  Only English course I've ever had with decent TA's. LOVED mine!

Loved him! This is a great class, I was actually kind of sad when it finished. I had a pretty tough TA so my grade was not amazing even though I was incredibly interested in the content of the class and worked hard. I think most people will really enjoy this class, but cannot be garunteed a good grade because it's based on the TA's personal opinion
Awesome guy- British sense of humor- funny guy ...very intelligent...knows his****
Prof. Nixon was really good and I would reccommend him to anyone who needs literature credits. Very interesting class also.

I loved this class.  The books are so interesting and different- I never thought I'd read so much Lesbian and Gay stuff but he made it really interesting.  He's not afraid to talk about the controversial stuff...

By far my favorite professor of my last semester.  He is an excellent lecturer and keeps it interesting.  I enjoyed most of the books and the work load is very manageable.  His accent is great to listen to - I love it!

fantastic class! astonishingly easy, and the books were all very good.  he is totally forthright about topics, doesn't sugar-coat, isn't afraid of making innocent little farm boys uncomfortable. south african accent is pretty sexy too! he's actually a very well-respected writer internationally, and wrote for the village voice which is pretty cool!
VERY EASY. Professor Nixon is hot.
2 verry enthusiastic thumbs up, fine family fun

awesome. a bit boring but usually I leave the lecture with something good. You can skip the lecture once every two weeks and not miss anything. 2 of 7 books suckass. The guest lecturer sucked. He has a soothing english accent and really knowledgable on the topics. I feel as though I learned a lot about the books from him.sparknotes to review -easy.

This class wasn't what I expected at all.  It said "Literature, Gender, and Sexuality" and we rarely talk about gender and sexuality.  The books are ok, but he could have chosen better ones.  Overall the class isn't too difficult, but it isn't really interesting either.
